Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 9 , Alboran Sea: 1 , Coral Sea: 2 , Pacific Ocean: 1 , Tyrrhenian Sea: 2 ;
total: 15 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 37 : 12 , FAO 71 : 2 , FAO 77 : 1 ;
total: 15 .

Remarks: This interstitial, intertidal or subtidal species (to 40 m bsl), has also been recorded in marine caves. It has been reported from southern and northern hemispheres in different types of sand and sediments in the tropical and southern parts of temperate zones.
